title: About <0>me</0>
content:
Graduated in Analysis and Systems Development, I am passionate about programming and innovation, with over 4 years of experience in system development.  I have knowledge in various widely used technologies in the development of modern applications, with a focus on cost reduction and fast development.

Throughout my career, I have worked on challenging projects and gained experience in different areas of system development. I always strive to stay updated with industry best practices and trends in order to deliver efficient and high-quality solutions.

As an entrepreneur, I have also had the opportunity to learn about project management and problem-solving.

Get in touch with me to exchange ideas and discuss potential collaborations, I'm always looking for new challenges.
